AFONiE Polarized Sunglasses Collection is featuring a light frame with UV400 and a thin 0.74mm polarized lenses for optimal sun blocking and style. Our polarized collection provides superior glare protection, especially on the water. The lenses contain a quality filter that blocks intense reflected light and reduces glare. Our AFONiE collection is sure to make you stand out whether at the beach, out in the ocean, work, vacation, or around the town. Great for fishing, biking, cycling, golfing, boating and driving with peace of mind and a 100% satisfaction guarantee.

  • Reduce Glare, Improve Safety - Improves eye comfort and allows you to take in the view without squinting. Glare can create a very uncomfortable eye health issue for people with sensitive eyes. A polarized lens removes the effects of glare by blocking reflections.
  • Reduce Eyestrain - Eyestrain can be relieved with polarized lens wear. Polarized lenses allow eyes to feel more comfortable and well-rested.
  • Better Vision - You will see crisply and cleanly. Wearing polarized lenses can reveal colors and images like never before.
  • The most beautiful gift for any occasion!.
